column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Soldier # 1 says : " Are you sure ? "
#Text=Soldier # 2 says : " Check the engine room . "
#Text=Raiko says : " What 's going on ?
#Text=I 'm telling you , I looked everywhere .
#Text=" Lin says : " All right , enough whispering !
#Text=" Raiko says : " I 'm ready to discuss the terms of the surrender with Baatar Jr. .
#Text=Where is he ?
#Text=" Soldier # 3 says : " Uh ... I 'm not really sure .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Baatar -- " Baatar Jr. says : " If you think I 'm going to spill all my secrets to you , Mother , you 're sadly mistaken .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Why are you doing this ?
#Text=I know you set out to help better the world , but this is madness !
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " It 's madness to let others take what 's yours and accept it blindly !
#Text=The United Republic belongs to us , and we 're taking it back .
#Text=" Suyin says : " But at what cost ?
#Text=How many people have to lose their lives before Kuvira is satisfied ?
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " It does n't have to cost any lives if you would all just surrender !
#Text=All that Kuvira and I want is a united Earth Empire !
#Text=" Suyin says : " I do n't know what I did to hurt you , but whatever it was , I 'm sorry .
#Text=When you left Zaofu , it broke my heart -- -- and our family has never been the same since .
#Text=Please , Baatar -- stop all this and come home .
#Text=We want you back with us .
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " Kuvira is my family now .
#Text=" Korra says : " We 've been going about his all wrong .
#Text=You 're right .
#Text=I 'm not gon na physically hurt you if you do n't talk .
#Text=But there is something I could do that will be even more painful .
#Text=I will take away the one thing you care for the most ... Kuvira .
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " What do you mean ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Kuvira might win .
#Text=She might chase us out of the city .
#Text=But you wo n't be around to enjoy the victory .
#Text=Because wherever I run , I 'll take you .
#Text=I am going to make it my life 's mission to never let you see the one you love again .
#Text=Is taking the city worth losing Kuvira forever ?
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " No !
#Text=You ca n't !
#Text=" Korra says : " I will ... unless you convince Kuvira to back off .
#Text=You two will still have the Earth Empire .
#Text=Just leave the United Republic alone .
#Text="
